string.text: As for the work of the guide...
I saw your message. Are you looking for a guide?
Oh, dude, you have not enough money for paying the penalty.
Remind me, where shall we go.
At last! Thank you, stalker, you did a good job. This money is your now.
I`m looking for an experienced stalker, who will escort to %s. At the moment I`m in %s. %s
We are late! We have agreed : pay the penalty of %s rubles. %s
Yes. I`m going to visit some place. The reward will be worth.\nAfter %s hours i`ll have to get into %s, I`ll pay %s rubles\nJust remember, if we do not arrive in time, I`ll take %s as the penalty
But we have agreed! Pay the penalty of %s rubles.
Size way(Include the start and end level):
